name: Anonymous
comment:
>>38009774
I vote against this write-in.

Firstly, how do *we* know that Liza has done a bad job of managing the situation when we've barely seen what's going on? Just makes us look like a pretentious dickwad.

Secondly, you're assuming the initial nameless attack on us was orchestrated by the PvP guild. Literally no evidence for that.

Third, accusing someone leading a PvP guild of lacking moral fibre? wat r u doin

Fourth, attempting to diffuse this destined fight is just silly.
